thread.title: Manchester United plotting Alexis Sanchez summer move? Transfer news and gossip from Saturday's papers

author: Football Spy
title: Manchester United plotting Alexis Sanchez summer move? Transfer news and gossip from Saturday's papers

organizations.name: moussa dembele share are manchester united

text:
Sport Manchester United plotting Alexis Sanchez summer move? Transfer news and gossip from Saturday's papers PLUS: Max Allegri gives Arsenal a deadline for his services AND Liverpool among the teams looking at Celtic's Moussa Dembele Share Are Manchester United joining the race to sign Alexis Sanchez? (Photo: Arsenal FC/Getty Images) Share Get football   Thank you for subscribing!   
Manchester United are preparing a package to lure Alexis Sanchez away from the Emirates this summer. 
Arsenal are slowly coming to terms with the realisation that the Chilean is keen to move away from the club in a bid to win silverware. 
But they are keen to ensure he goes abroad if he doesn't leave, and would do everything in their power to prevent their top scorer from joining a Premier League rival. 
Yet the Express reports that such a move could be on the cards, with Jose Mourinho's scouts keeping tabs on the Sanchez saga, as it increasingly looks like first-choice target Antoine Griezmann will stay in Spain. 
A move for Sanchez to Old Trafford would particularly rankle Arsenal fans after they had to watch former top scorer Robin van Persie win the Premier League with the Red Devils. Robin Van Persie went on to win the Premier League after leaving Arsenal for Manchester United (Photo: Matthew Peters) Saturday's gossip from other newspapers and websites 
Staying with Arsenal, the Gunners have been given three weeks to decide if they want Massimiliano Allegri to succeed Arsene Wenger as their next manager in the summer (Daily Star). 
Liverpool are among a host of Premier League giants sending scouts to watch Moussa Dembele in the Old Firm clash with Rangers this Sunday (Sun). Liverpool count themselves among Moussa Dembele's many rivals (Photo: Ian MacNicol) 
Arsenal could sign Juventus star Paulo Dybala if Max Allegri moves from the Old Lady to the Gunners this summer, but Barcelona and Real Madrid are both keen on him (Express). 
Paris Saint-Germain will turn their attentions to Mauricio Pochettino in their ongoing quest to win the Champions League after Unai Emery's latest setback (Daily Star). Paulo Dybala could follow Max Allegri to Arsenal if the Juve boss makes the switch (Photo: AFP) Saturday's stories from the Mirror 
West Brom are considering a summer swoop for Chelsea legend John Terry . Boss Tony Pulis has confirmed the Baggies could move again for the veteran defender, after having a January window enquiry rejected. John Terry may join up with Tony Pulis at West Brom (Photo: Action Images via Reuters) 
Liverpool's Jurgen Klopp pours cold water on Joe Hart transfer talk by hailing "really, really good keepers" Simon Mignolet and Loris Karius. 
LA Galaxy have had "conversations" with Manchester United striker Zlatan Ibrahimovic over a summer move, according to the Major League Soccer club's former general manager Alexi Lalas. 
Arsenal's THIRD choice keeper Emiliano Martinez may face non-League giant-killers Lincoln as boss Arsene Wenger waits on David Ospina injury. Martinez last played for the Gunners in December 2014. poll loading Will Sanchez play for another Premier League team next season? 0+ VOTES SO FAR
